services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: Trusted Technology Curriculum & Tech Education Market Leader since 2025. Providing young folks in...

items.title: Tech Training
items.description: Master the latest technologies through intensive, project-based learning. Whether you're a beginner or looking to upskill, we have a path for you.

items.title: Mentorship
items.description: Get guidance from industry experts. Our mentorship program connects you with experienced professionals who can help you navigate your career.

items.title: Career Services
items.description: We don't just teach you skills; we help you launch your career. From resume reviews to mock interviews, we've got you covered.

features.title: Innovating the Future, One Mind at a Time.
features.description: At ITOTECH, we believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to learn and grow. That's why we're committed to accessible, high-quality tech education for all.

points.title: Expert Instructors
points.desc: Learn from industry professionals who are passionate about teaching.

points.title: Hybrid Learning
points.desc: Flexible online and offline classes to suit your schedule.

points.title: Career Focus
points.desc: We prepare you for the job market with real-world projects.

points.title: Supportive Community
points.desc: Join a network of peers and mentors who will support you every step.

programs.title: Explore Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Choose your path and start your journey today. We offer a wide range of programs designed to equip you with in-demand skills.

items.title: CAD & Design
items.description: Master Computer-Aided Design and creative modeling.

items.title: Simulation & Analysis
items.description: Learn advanced simulation techniques and data analysis.

items.title: Web Development

items.title: Tech for Young Minds
items.description: Inspiring the next generation of tech innovators.

founders.title: Meet the Mind Behind ITOTECH
founders.subtitle: Driven by a passion for education and a vision for the future of technology in Africa.

items.name: Ijagun Itothe Joy
items.bio: I founded ITOTECH with a simple belief: that technology is the great equalizer. Our goal isn't just to teach code, but to unlock the boundless potential within every young person who walks through our doors.

items.quote: I came into ITOTECH knowing nothing about code. 6 months later, I'm building full-stack apps and interning at a startup. The project-based learning is a game changer.
items.author: Sarah Adebayo

items.quote: I came into ITOTECH knowing nothing about Design. 6 months later, I'm designing project I see as complex before.
items.author: Emmanuel K.

cta_section.title: Ready to start your journey?
